headline: How Investors May Respond To Nissan Motor (TSE:7201) Advancing Bi-Directional EV Charging For Grid Stability
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) announced that it is working with Nissan and Fermata Energy on a pioneering project integrating bi-directional electric vehicle charging with a microgrid at California’s Redwood Coast Airport, using Nissan LEAF vehicles to support grid stability through advanced frequency response and energy management. This unique collaboration marks a significant step in vehicle-to-grid technology, placing Nissan at the leading edge of efforts to enhance grid...
